text: â€œKhawa nikhuoni khan nangni'n kei kadiang iteii naninutun. Kei'n nangnidiang inthiangnga kanati: kei karamingnga Kapa diang ning-ini rakip kha, ama'n anapesik eii.16:23. kei karamingnga Kapa diang ning-ini rakip kha, ama'n anapesik eii; Manuscript lekkhat in hin tia injia Kapa diang angmokhat ningni inchu, ama'n kei karamingnga anapesik eii.
